= Introduction =

The project collects resource, programming examples and slides which are presented during the lecture "Concepts of Modern Programming Languages" ([https://is.cuni.cz/studium/predmety/index.php?tid=&do=predmet&kod=NPRG014 NPRG014]).

The lecture introduces various features of the following languages:
  * Groovy
  * Clojure
  * Scala
  * Erlang
  * Javascript

|| *Feature*                  || *Language(s)*   ||
|| Static meta-programming    || Groovy          ||
|| Dynamic meta-programming   || Groovy, Clojure ||
|| Domain-specific languages  || Groovy, Scala   ||
|| Functional programming     || Groovy, Scala, Clojure, Erlang ||
|| Concurrency                || Groovy, Erlang, Scala, Clojure ||
|| Prototype-based programming || JavaScript, CoffeeScript ||
|| Scripting support          || Groovy, JavaScript ||
|| Web programming            || Scala, JavaScript (Node.JS) ||
|| Distributed concurrency    || Erlang, Clojure, Scala (Akka) ||
|| Lazy data structures       || Clojure, Erlang ||
